casebody.data:
In the Matter PURPORTED WILL OF BARNES. No. 262A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 24, 2004. Danny D. McNally, Greenville, Emma S. Holscher, for Riley S. Corddry (Heir at Law). Myron T. Hill, Jr., Greenville, for Diane Graue (Heir at Law). Stephen A. Dunn, Raleigh, Raymond E. Dunn, Jr., New Bern, for Lucy Tull (Heir at Law). Marvin Blount, Jr., Greenville, Ted Mackali, Jr., Rebecca Cameron Blount, for Caveators, Beneficiaries of the 1967 Will of Francis M. Barnes. Eva C. Currin, Jeffrey A. Batts, Joseph L. Bell, Jr., Rocky Mount, Wendy P. Wilson, for Propounders of 1989 Will of Estate of Francis M. Barnes. Gregory S. Camp, Rocky Mount, for Church of the Advent. Charles J. Murray, Special Deputy Attorney General, for ECU Athletic Fund.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of March 2004 by Propounder (Joseph H. Thigpen) for Expedited Consideration:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of March 2004."
